comments:
This happens whenever your plugin-directory contains fragments without the 
associated plugin.

E. g. if you install the eclipse2.1.2.1-SDK-win32-LanguagePackFeature.zip into 
a standard eclipse installation from eclipse-SDK-2.1.2-win32.zip then 
org.eclipse.xsd.nl1_2.1.2 is a fragment that has no associated plugin.

Activating the "Create Ant Build File" option from the context menu of the 
plugin.xml ends with a NullPointerException.

My stacktrace comes from a 2.1.2 installation but the same behaviour shows up 
for 2.1.1.

The stacktrace is:

java.lang.NullPointerException
